document_data.name: Oldblood
document_data.components: The secretions of [[sea snail#Species|hunting knight snails]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Oldblood''', also known as '''Heartsblood''', was a type of purple dye produced from the secretions of [[sea snail#Species|hunting knight snails]].{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-09-05 - Purple Dye and Snails}}
document_data.Price: The price of this dye was typically rather expensive, due to it being rather difficult and time-consuming to gather enough snails for a good batch.
document_data.Creation:
This dye was produced by exposing the secretions of hunting knight sails to [[the sun|sunlight]]. Several species across the seas of [[Toril]] could be used for this purpose.

Typically large numbers of hunting knight snails were gathered and crushed in order to form a batch of this dye, but as population numbers declined due to overhunting people would resort to instead keeping the snails alive and milking them. This took a lot of work and was usually done by young or aging members of fisherfolk families.
